scripts.docker_db: docker run --name postgres -e POSTGRES_USER=root -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=root -e POSTGRES_DB=grpc -p 5432:5432 -d postgres
scripts.newService: cd src/services && mkdir %serviceName% && cd %serviceName% && mkdir implementation && mkdir pb && copy NUL> echo %serviceName%Methods.js && cd pb && copy NUL> messages.proto
